name: International Sweeteners Association
membership: ISA is a member of EU Specialty Food Ingredients (formally ELC). Registration No: 6160532422-38
goal:
The Association is a non-profit making association. Its aim is to promote the introduction, growth and development of safe, calorie-free or low-calorie sweeteners, as well as their use, individually or in combination, in food, beverages and table-top sweeteners.

The Association constitutes an efficient means of communication between industry, the scientific community, regulatory, governmental and health-related authorities, as well as consumer associations of the European Union, the World Health Organisation, the United Nations and other international organisations, both directly with them and through the intermediary of local associations at national level. The association engages in communications activities directly with consumers

The Association implements action programmes and provides information to legislative, governmental and health-related authorities, on request during consultations. In addition information is regularly provided to health care professionals and media.
euInitiatives:
- Implementation measures linked to Regulation 1333/2008 on food additives (and related amendments)
- Implementation measures linked to Regulation 1169/2011 on food information to the consumer
- Implementation measures linked to Regulation (EC) 1924/2006 on Nutrition & Health Claims
